page.title: 08Wyndham caravan site
page.content: The caravan site is situated at about a mile out of Cockermouth town centre. It has three types of lodgings which are: pine log cabins, huts and caravans. The site also has a tourist information hut which also sells small groceries. This is situated in the centre of the site and is easily accessible. Caravans,which are in rows on a field, are the most common type of lodging. There are a few huts and about 20 log cabins spread about the site. The site which is in the countryside has a stream running through the middle of it and is surrounded by trees.
